named-query.name: listNewSections
named-query.query: SELECT ns FROM NewSection ns WHERE ns.newId = :newId ORDER BY ns.sectionId

named-query.name: listNewDocuments
named-query.query: SELECT nd FROM NewDocument nd WHERE (nd.newId = :newId) AND ((nd.newDocTypeId = :docType) OR (:docType is null)) ORDER BY nd.newDocTypeId,nd.documentId

named-query.name: listNewsDocuments
named-query.query: SELECT nd.newId,nd.documentId,nd.newDocTypeId FROM NewDocument nd WHERE (locate(concat(' ', concat(nd.newId, ' ')), :newId) > 0) AND ((nd.newDocTypeId = :docType) OR (:docType IS NULL)) ORDER BY nd.documentId

named-query.name: listSources
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM Source s ORDER BY s.name

named-query.name: removeNewSections
named-query.query: DELETE FROM NewSection ns WHERE ns.newId = :newId

named-query.name: removeNewDocuments
named-query.query: DELETE FROM NewDocument nd WHERE nd.newId = :newId

named-query.name: listNews
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT n.newId,n.headline,n.summary,n.registerDate, n.registerTime,n.startDate,n.startTime,n.endDate, n.endTime,n.strDraft,n.source,n.userId,n.keywords,n.customUrl, n.customUrlTarget FROM New n LEFT JOIN n.newSections ns WHERE ( ( (:newIds IS NOT NULL) AND (locate(concat(' ', concat(n.newId, ' ')), :newIds) > 0) ) OR (:newIds IS NULL) ) AND ( (:content IS NULL) OR (lower(n.summary) LIKE :content) OR (lower(n.headline) LIKE :content) OR (lower(n.keywords) LIKE :content) ) AND ( ( (:minDate IS NULL) AND (:maxDate IS NULL) ) OR ( (:minDate IS NULL) AND (:maxDate >= concat(n.startDate, n.startTime)) ) OR ( (:maxDate IS NULL) AND (:minDate <= concat(n.endDate, n.endTime)) ) OR ( (:minDate <= concat(n.endDate, n.endTime)) AND (:maxDate >= concat(n.startDate, n.startTime)) ) ) AND ( ( (:excludeNotPublished = 'N') AND ( ( (:sections IS NOT NULL) AND ( (locate(concat(' ', concat(ns.sectionId, ' ')), :sections) > 0) OR (ns.sectionId IS NULL) ) ) OR (:sections IS NULL) ) ) OR ( (:excludeNotPublished = 'Y') AND ( ( (:sections IS NOT NULL) AND (locate(concat(' ', concat(ns.sectionId, ' ')), :sections) > 0) ) OR ( (:sections IS NULL) AND (ns.sectionId IS NOT NULL) ) ) ) ) AND ( (:excludeDrafts = 'N') OR (n.strDraft = 'N') ) AND ( (:minPubDate IS NULL) OR (concat(n.startDate,n.startTime) >= :minPubDate) ) AND ( (:userId IS NULL) OR (trim(n.userId) = :userId) ) ORDER BY n.startDate desc,n.startTime desc,n.newId

named-query.name: countNews
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT n.newId) FROM New n LEFT JOIN n.newSections ns WHERE ( ( (:newIds IS NOT NULL) AND (locate(concat(' ', concat(n.newId, ' ')), :newIds) > 0) ) OR (:newIds IS NULL) ) AND ( (:content IS NULL) OR (lower(n.summary) LIKE :content) OR (lower(n.headline) LIKE :content) OR (lower(n.keywords) LIKE :content) ) AND ( ( (:minDate IS NULL) AND (:maxDate IS NULL) ) OR ( (:minDate IS NULL) AND (:maxDate >= concat(n.startDate, n.startTime)) ) OR ( (:maxDate IS NULL) AND (:minDate <= concat(n.endDate, n.endTime)) ) OR ( (:minDate <= concat(n.endDate, n.endTime)) AND (:maxDate >= concat(n.startDate, n.startTime)) ) ) AND ( ( (:excludeNotPublished = 'N') AND ( ( (:sections IS NOT NULL) AND ( (locate(concat(' ', concat(ns.sectionId, ' ')), :sections) > 0) OR (ns.sectionId IS NULL) ) ) OR (:sections IS NULL) ) ) OR ( (:excludeNotPublished = 'Y') AND ( ( (:sections IS NOT NULL) AND (locate(concat(' ', concat(ns.sectionId, ' ')), :sections) > 0) ) OR ( (:sections IS NULL) AND (ns.sectionId IS NOT NULL) ) ) ) ) AND ( (:excludeDrafts = 'N') OR (n.strDraft = 'N') ) AND ( (:minPubDate IS NULL) OR (concat(n.startDate,n.startTime) >= :minPubDate) ) AND ( (:userId IS NULL) OR (trim(n.userId) = :userId) )

named-query.name: countNewsInSection
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(n.newId) FROM New n LEFT JOIN n.newSections ns WHERE ( ( (:newIds IS NOT NULL) AND (locate(concat(' ', concat(n.newId, ' ')), :newIds) > 0) ) OR (:newIds IS NULL) ) AND ( (:content IS NULL) OR (lower(n.headline) LIKE :content) OR (lower(n.summary) LIKE :content) OR (lower(n.keywords) LIKE :content) ) AND ( ( (:minDate IS NULL) AND (:maxDate IS NULL) ) OR ( (:minDate IS NULL) AND (:maxDate >= concat(n.startDate, n.startTime)) ) OR ( (:maxDate IS NULL) AND (:minDate <= concat(n.endDate, n.endTime)) ) OR ( (:minDate <= concat(n.endDate, n.endTime)) AND (:maxDate >= concat(n.startDate, n.startTime)) ) ) AND ( (:sectionId IS NULL) OR (ns.sectionId = :sectionId) ) AND ( (:minPubDate IS NULL) OR (concat(n.startDate,n.startTime) >= :minPubDate) ) AND ( (:excludeDrafts = 'N') OR (n.strDraft = 'N') ) AND ( (:userId IS NULL) OR (trim(n.userId) = :userId) )

named-query.name: findNewsInSection
named-query.query: SELECT n.newId,n.headline,n.summary,n.registerDate, n.registerTime,n.startDate,n.startTime,n.endDate, n.endTime,n.strDraft,ns.sectionId,ns.priority, ns.readingCount,n.keywords,ns.strSticky,n.customUrl,n.customUrlTarget FROM New n LEFT JOIN n.newSections ns WHERE ( ( (:newIds IS NOT NULL) AND (locate(concat(' ', concat(n.newId, ' ')), :newIds) > 0) ) OR (:newIds IS NULL) ) AND ( (:content IS NULL) OR (lower(n.headline) LIKE :content) OR (lower(n.summary) LIKE :content) OR (lower(n.keywords) LIKE :content) ) AND ( ( (:minDate IS NULL) AND (:maxDate IS NULL) ) OR ( (:minDate IS NULL) AND (:maxDate >= concat(n.startDate, n.startTime)) ) OR ( (:maxDate IS NULL) AND (:minDate <= concat(n.endDate, n.endTime)) ) OR ( (:minDate <= concat(n.endDate, n.endTime)) AND (:maxDate >= concat(n.startDate, n.startTime)) ) ) AND ( (:sectionId IS NULL) OR (ns.sectionId = :sectionId) ) AND ( (:minPubDate IS NULL) OR (concat(n.startDate,n.startTime) >= :minPubDate) ) AND ( (:excludeDrafts = 'N') OR (n.strDraft = 'N') ) AND ( (:userId IS NULL) OR (trim(n.userId) = :userId) ) ORDER BY ns.strSticky,ns.priority DESC,n.startDate DESC, n.startTime DESC,n.newId

named-query.name: getMaxPriorityInSection
named-query.query: SELECT MAX (ns.priority) FROM NewSection ns WHERE (ns.sectionId = :sectionId)
